file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: NCrypt API
  description: NCrypt API documentation

servers:
  - url: https://api.ncrypt.site/api/v1

paths:
  /note/{id}:
    get:
      description: Retrieve a note and probably destory it after retrieval
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
          required: true
          description: secure note id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Note data decrypted
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveNoteResponse'

        '400':
          description: Error while retrieving note
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseError'

        '500':
          description: Server error, normally indicates something wrong on the app side
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseError'


  /note:
    post:
      description: Lets a user post a new artist
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateNoteRequest'

      responses:
        '201':
          description: Successfully created a new artist
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateNoteResponse'

        '422':
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseError'

        '500':
          description: Server error, normally indicates something wrong on the app side
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseError'

components:
  schemas:
    CreateNoteRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - message
        - self_destruct
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          example: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
        self_destruct:
          type: integer
          enum:
            - 0
            - 1
            - 3
            - 6
            - 12
            - 24
            - 48
            - 72
            - 168
            - 720
          example: 3
        destruct_after_opening:
          type: boolean
          example: false
    CreateNoteResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
        message:
          type: string
        data:
          type: object
          properties:
            id:
              type: string
              format: uuid
              example: 7f916723-72c8-4da5-8e1e-2432094f643a
            url:
              type: string
              example: 'https://ncrypt.site/note/7f916723-72c8-4da5-8e1e-2432094f643a'
        error:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          example: null
        meta:
          type: object
          example: null
    ResponseError:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          example:
            - 422
            - 400
            - 500
        message:
          type: string
          example: unable to retrieve note
        data:
          type: object
          example: null
        error:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          example:
            - note does not exist
        meta:
          type: object
          example: null
    RetrieveNoteResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          example: 200
        message:
          type: string
          example: Message retrieved.
        data:
          type: object
          properties:
            note:
              type: string
              example: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
        error:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          example: null
        meta:
          type: object
          example: null
